definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge

sentences.english: An industrial city ins poland on the vistula .
sentences.chinese: 波蘭南部的一個工業城市，位於維斯杜拉河沿岸。

sentences.english: The coast is populated largely by Miskito Indians and descendants of African slaves.
sentences.chinese: 沿岸住滿了大量的米斯基託原住民和黑奴的後代。

sentences.english: Soon, it started to develop along the shores of False Creek adjacent to Gastown.
sentences.chinese: 不久，它開始沿着鄰近蓋斯鎮的福溪沿岸發展起來。

sentences.english: All of the nations in the pacific rim have been watching China's military developmen¬ts with alarm.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋沿岸國家已經注意到中國軍力壯大的危險。

sentences.english: Most Chinese-Americans live in cities on the Pacific and Atlantic coasts.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的美藉華人住在太平洋和大西洋沿岸的城市。

sentences.english: An investigation of foraminifera was conducted in the last glacial loess along the coast of the Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 通過對渤海沿岸末次冰期黃土中有孔蟲化石的研究。

sentences.english: The boats anchored along the shore at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 好幾艘船拂曉時沿岸拋錨。

sentences.english: The disabled ship coasted the island, looking for a harbor.
sentences.chinese: 那艘損壞的船隻是在海島沿岸航行以找到港口。

sentences.english: This process of longshore transport is responsible for moving sediment up and down coastlines.
sentences.chinese: 在沿岸運輸的過程中，沉澱物在海岸線上下移動。

sentences.english: All along the Kowloon shore， land values would go up.
sentences.chinese: 九龍沿岸的地價會全面上升。

sentences.english: We houseboated along the Thames yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我們昨天乘居住船遊覽了泰晤士河的沿岸風光。

sentences.english: The cross-shore profile of current velocity induced by irregular wave is smoother than the current induced by regular wave.
sentences.chinese: 不規則波浪作用下沿岸流的速度分佈相對平緩。

sentences.english: Communities across the Gulf Coast were forever changed.
sentences.chinese: 整個波斯灣沿岸地區的社區永久性改變。

sentences.english: More than 2,500 sinkholes now line the shores of the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 在死海沿岸已經有超過2500個陷坑。

sentences.english: The caves by Lijiang River are well-known all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 灕江沿岸的巖洞也是世界馳名。

sentences.english: The trees on the shore line were reflected in the clear water.
sentences.chinese: 沿岸的樹木在清清的河水裏倒映出來。

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
opposite bank (of a body of water)
